full_description:
Revenger TURBO 120mm RGB Case Fan

The Revenger TURBO 120mm RGB Case Fan is a compact and efficient cooling solution for your PC. With its size of 120 × 120 × 25mm, it provides effective airflow to keep your system cool. The Revenger TURBO casing cooler fan operates at a speed of 1200RPM ±10% while maintaining a low noise level of 19.5 dBA. It delivers an air volume of 30 CFM, ensuring efficient heat dissipation. With a voltage of DC 12V and a rated power of 3W ±10%, it offers reliable performance. The Revenger TURBO fan features a 4-pin interface for easy installation and comes with 7 blades for optimal airflow. With a cable length of 50cm and a weight of 10g, it is convenient to install and lightweight.

full_description:
Revenger RAINBOW-3 3-in-1 ARGB Case Fan Kit

The Revenger RAINBOW-3 3-in-1 ARGB Case Fan Kit is an excellent PC cooling solution. Three 120mm fans with hydraulic bearings are included in the kit, ensuring smooth and quiet operation. These fans are built to last, with a life expectancy of 40,000 hours. They have a voltage rating of 12 VDC and an airflow of 35.9CMF10%, which keeps your system cool even during heavy use. For optimal performance, the fan speed is set to 1200 RPM 10%, while the noise level is kept at a low 24 dBA. The Revenger RAINBOW-3 3-in-1 ARGB Case Fan Kit has a 6-pin connector and can be synced with your motherboard via the 3-pin SYNC M/B connector. A SATA power connector is used to provide power.
